front.title: Probe Droid Laser
front.gametext: Deploy on your probe droid. May target an artillery weapon (use 5 as defense value), character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Artillery weapon lost if destiny > defense value. Character or creature hit if destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Although a probe droid's primary defense is stealth, many models can be equipped with a laser cannon to enhance the droid's combat and sabotage capabilities.
